name: Letter Lab
description:
Repair the name of each level using a hilariously complex system of machines :)

// WASD - Movement
// Space - Place a waypoint, then WASD to set its direction
// Shift - Hold to move faster
// Enter - Skip level

—

Place waypoints to control the direction of the continuously spawning basic parts.
Guiding them through the right machines to process them into the correct letterforms.
Get them to the missing gaps in the level title to complete each level.

Made by Luke Thompson and Pete West.
